subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Second baseman Robinson Cano is said to be asking for a 10-year, $310 million contract, while the Yankees are said to be offering about seven years at about $23 million a year.
snippet: Second baseman Robinson Cano is said to be asking for a 10-year, $310 million contract, while the Yankees are said to be offering about seven years at about $23 million a year.
